configFileTemplateContent:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: sample-grafana-datasource
  labels:
     grafana_datasource: 1
data:
  datasource.yaml: |-
    apiVersion: 1
    deleteDatasources:
      - name: ${source_name}
        orgId: 1
    datasources:
    - name: ${source_name}
      type: prometheus
      access: proxy
      orgId: 1
      url: ${source_addr}
      basicAuth: false
      isDefault: true
      version: 1
      editable: false
